languages.text: {n}Старик понижает голос.{/n} "А хто его ведает. Говорят, что он и вовсеча уже и не правит нами. Дескать, охмурили его {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}лесные духи{/d}, что по ночам в егоный дворец шастают. Шепчут ему в уши всякое, наставляют злокозненно. Энто по их указке он и експедиции на острова запретить хотел, да ему красные жрецы не позволили. Живут оне там, духи эти, на старых капищах".

{n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик понижает голос.{/n} "А хто его ведает. Говорят, что он и вовсеча уже и не правит нами. languages.text: {n}老人压低了声音。{/n}“谁知道怎么样了呢？大家都说，总督已经不再管我们了。他们都说，是{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}森林里的妖精{/d}哄骗了他，那群妖精会在晚上溜进宫殿里，偷偷摸摸地在总督耳边说些悄悄话。那些妖精说着各种各样的邪恶阴谋，甚至不允许任何人到岛上去，但那些红袍祭司不让总督这么做。我听说那些妖精就住在那座岛上，住在他们古老的森林圣殿里。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人压低了声音。{/n}“谁知道怎么样了呢？大家都说，总督已经不再管我们了。他们都说，是森林里的妖精哄骗了他，那群妖精会在晚上溜进宫殿里，偷偷默默地在总督耳边说些悄悄话。那些妖精说着各种各样的邪恶阴谋，甚至不允许任何人到岛上去，但那些红袍祭司不让总督这么做。我听说那些妖精就住在那座岛上，住在他们古老的森林圣殿里。”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人は声のトーンを落とす。{/n}「分かったもんじゃありません。彼はもう私達に指示はしないと言ってた奴らもいるんです。どうやら、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}森の精霊{/d}が夜に彼を誘惑しているらしいですよ。精霊たちは、彼の耳に様々な事を囁く ― 邪悪な策略と謀略のすべてをね。その結果、彼が島への探索を禁止するところでした。だが、赤の司祭が止めたんです。精霊たちは、古い森の祠に住んでいます」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は声のトーンを落とす。{/n}「分かったもんじゃありません。彼はもう私達に指示はしないと言ってた奴らもいるんです。どうやら、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}森の精霊{/d}が夜に彼を誘惑しているらしいですよ。精霊たちは、彼の耳に様々な事を囁く ― 邪悪な策略と謀略のすべてをね。その結果、彼が島への探索を禁止するところでした。だが、赤の司祭が止めたんです。精霊たちは、古い森の祠に住んでいます」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}El anciano baja la voz.{/n} «A saber. La gente dice que el tipo asignado ya no nos gobierna, que son los {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}espíritus del bosque{/d} que entran en su palacio por la noche, susurrándole al oído toda clase de planes y conjuras. Casi le hicieron prohibir las expediciones a las islas, pero los sacerdotes rojos se lo impidieron. Es que los espíritus viven ahí, en sus altares del bosque».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano baja la voz.{/n} «A saber. La gente dice que el tipo asignado ya no nos gobierna, que son los espíritus del bosque que entran en su palacio por la noche, susurrándole al oído toda clase de planes y conjuras. Casi le hicieron prohibir las expediciones a las islas, pero los sacerdotes rojos se lo impidieron. Es que los espíritus viven ahí, en sus altares del bosque».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Wer kann das bei ihm schon wissen? Es heißt, er würde uns gar nicht mehr regieren. Es heißt, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}Waldgeister{/d} hätten ihn verführt, die Geister, die nachts in seinen Palast schleichen. Diese Geister flüstern ihm Dinge ins Ohr, all ihre bösen Pläne und Intrigen. Fast hätten sie ihn dazu gebracht, Expeditionen auf die Inseln zu verbieten, aber das haben die roten Priester nicht zugelassen. Dort leben sie, diese Geister. In ihren alten Waldschreinen."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Wer kann das bei ihm schon wissen? Es heißt, er würde uns gar nicht mehr regieren. Es heißt, Waldgeister hätten ihn verführt, die Geister, die nachts in seinen Palast schleichen. Diese Geister flüstern ihm Dinge ins Ohr, all ihre bösen Pläne und Intrigen. Fast hätten sie ihn dazu gebracht, Expeditionen auf die Inseln zu verbieten, aber das haben die roten Priester nicht zugelassen. Dort leben sie, diese Geister. In ihren alten Waldschreinen."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme vous répond à voix basse :{/n} « Qui peut le dire, avec lui... Paraît qu'il nous gouverne même plus. On raconte que des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}esprits de la forêt{/d} se glissent dans son palais la nuit pour l'amadouer et qu'ils lui chuchotent des complots plus tordus les uns que les autres. Ils ont presque réussi à lui faire interdire les expéditions sur les îles, mais les prêtres rouges l'ont pas laissé faire. Vous comprenez, c'est là qu'ils vivent, ces esprits. Dans les vieux sanctuaires de la forêt. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme vous répond à voix basse :{/n} « Qui peut le dire, avec lui... Paraît qu'il nous gouverne même plus. On raconte que des esprits de la forêt se glissent dans son palais la nuit pour l'amadouer et qu'ils lui chuchotent des complots plus tordus les uns que les autres. Ils ont presque réussi à lui faire interdire les expéditions sur les îles, mais les prêtres rouges l'ont pas laissé faire. Vous comprenez, c'est là qu'ils vivent, ces esprits. Dans les vieux sanctuaires de la forêt. »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Kim bilir ne durumda... Artık bizi yöneten o bile değilmiş, öyle diyorlar. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}Orman ruhları{/d} kandırmış onu. Gece sarayına giriyorlarmış. Kulağına fısıldıyorlarmış. Türlü türlü fenalıklar yaptırıyorlarmış. Az daha ada seferlerini yasaklatıyorlardı da kızıl rahipler araya girdi. Ruhlar orada yaşıyor ya, ondan. Eski orman mabetleri var orada."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man lowers his voice.{/n} "Who knows with him. Folks say he doesn't govern us no more at all. They say {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}forest spirits{/d} have coaxed him, the ones that slip inside his palace at night. Those spirits whisper things into his ears — all their wicked ploys and plots. They almost made him ban expeditions to the islands, but the red priests didn't let him. It's where they live, those spirits. In their old forest shrines."

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyar, sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Ne durumda, kim bilir? Artık bizi yöneten o bile değilmiş, öyle diyorlar. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}Orman ruhları{/d} kandırmış onu. Gece sarayına giriyorlarmış. Kulağına fısıldıyorlarmış. Türlü türlü fenalıklar yaptırıyorlarmış. Az daha ada seferlerini yasaklatıyorlardı da kızıl rahipler araya girdi. Ruhlar orada yaşıyor ya, ondan. Eski orman mabetleri var orada."
traits.speaker: OldMan
